ComicInfo.Series: Tarot: Witch of the Black Rose
ComicInfo.Summary:
"The Goblin Queen" Story and Art By Jim Balent The Goblins throw a party for Raven Hex and this year it's wild! While Raven finds herself in the most dangerous part of the Enchanted Realm, trying to save a love sick Goblin from certain death, Tarot is left behind and becomes the prime target of all Goblin mischief!
